quotes.quote: If you can't be funny, be interesting.
Everything is funny, if you can laugh at it.
Small things amuse small minds.
There's only one true superpower amongst human beings, and that is being funny. People treat you differently if you can make them laugh.
Funny is when you're serious.
If we entertain temptations, soon they begin entertaining us!
Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.
Life's more amusing than we thought.
But with comedy it's a simple premise. If it's funny, people laugh. If it's not, they don't.
Comedy is just complaining in an entertaining way, Enterplaining.
Being funny is not the same as being happy.
The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
Normal people with normal problems can be hilarious.
Kids can amuse themselves with almost anything.
We never respect those who amuse us, however we may smile at their comic powers.
To live simply to die is by no means amusing, but to live with the knowledge that you will die before your time, that's really is idiotic
What is amusing now had to be taken in desperate earnest once.
Everything considered, work is less boring than amusing oneself.
If people are talking behind your back, be happy that you are the one in front.
Sometimes wrong is worth the funny!
To make fun of a person to his face is a brutal way of amusing one's self; be delicate and cunning, and keep your laugh in your sleeve, lest you frighten away your game.
There is definitely a pressure for funny people to be funny. People want them to perform all the time.
There's nothing more fun than entertaining kids.
Of course, everyone wants to be healthy. The amusing thing is no one's really sure how to do it.
Some people are like clouds. When they go away, it's a brighter day.
It's not by amusing oneself that one learns.
Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired.
Grilling takes the formality out of entertaining. Everyone wants to get involved.
The implication that there was something wrong with the war plan is amusing.
The only way to amuse some people is to slip and fall on an icy pavement.
